duck: Contentment - Contentment is the acknowledgement and satisfaction of reaching capacity.
Computer user satisfaction - Computer user satisfaction is the attitude of a user to the computer systemhe employs in the context of his/her work environments.
satisfaction definition: the payment through penance of the temporal punishment incurred by a sin.
"(I Can't Get No) Satisfaction", a 1965 rock song by the Rolling Stones
Customer satisfaction - Customer satisfaction, a term frequently used in marketing, is a measure of how products and services supplied by a company meet or surpass customer expectation.
Job satisfaction - Job satisfaction is how content an individual is with his or her job.
Satisfaction theory of atonement, a Christian view of salvation
